price: maliban bilang awa mula sa Amin at bilang natatamasa hanggang sa isang panahon.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
